tags.name: File Attribute
tags.description: Operations with attributes related to the file.

tags.name: Quota

put.summary: Add specified files to the folder.

401.description: Unauthenticated. Possible reasons: missing Authorization token, bad token or service is not activated in the ECM

403.description: Forbidden. Your service does not have permission to execute the action.

404.description: Content not found, most likely you are accessing non-existent or deleted content.

204.description: Request processed successfully, but response contains no content.

delete.summary: Delete folder. Deletes all files within the specified folder for which you have DELETE permission. This means that after this operation the folder may still contain files, e.g. files uploaded by another service that did not grant you permission to DELETE them.

parameters.name: archive
parameters.description: Whether the folder should be deleted from the main or archive storage

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Flag which define putting file in a trash on remove immediately.

401.description: Unauthenticated. Possible reasons: missing Authorization token, bad token or service is not activated in the ECM

403.description: Forbidden. Your service does not have permission to execute the action.

404.description: Content not found, most likely you are accessing non-existent or deleted content.

delete.summary: Removes specified folder. Does not delete the files inside, only removes them from the folder.

401.description: Unauthenticated. Possible reasons: missing Authorization token, bad token or service is not activated in the ECM

403.description: Forbidden. Your service does not have permission to execute the action.

404.description: Content not found, most likely you are accessing non-existent or deleted content.

204.description: Request processed successfully, but response contains no content.

delete.summary: Delete folder. Deletes all files within the specified folder for which you have DELETE permission. This means that after this operation the folder may still contain files, e.g. files uploaded by another service that did not grant you permission to DELETE them.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Folder of the file. Must conform to pattern ^[A-Za-z0-9\-_.*'()]{4,40}$

parameters.name: archive
parameters.description: Whether the folder should be deleted from the main or archive storage

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Flag which define putting file in a trash on remove immediately.

FileInfoAttributeInputDTO.description: File Info Attribute DTO. Contains attribute name, value, type. Available attribute types: keyword; date; boolean; long; integer; float; double; tag
